nodes.text: Spennie was a female who was a member of the Resistance's Cobalt Squadron. Spennie served as the tail gunner of the Resistance bomber Cobalt Hammer during the Atterra campaign and later the evacuation of D'Qar. Right before the battle she reported that her gun turret's systems were green. She was killed when her bomber was destroyed during its successful attack run against the Mandator IV-class Siege Dreadnought Fulminatrix.
